title: The Emperor’s Favor (Interstellar ABO) - Novel Updates
tags: Artificial Intelligence   Enemies Become Lovers   Military   Older Love Interests   Omegaverse   Orphans   Strong Love Interests
author: Red Raccoon   红狸
description:
As an Omega, just wanted to work hard, have a good life, and find a suitable Beta to spend the rest of his life with.

But then the accident happened, he experienced his first heat, and was marked by a pureblood Alpha — all when he was 15 years old.

The world is dominated by Alphas, and most pureblood Alphas lived long — and indifferent — lives.

Lin Xiao felt it was a far better deal to take care of himself and live with a frigid man. Otherwise, how would he cope with the countless heats and ruts of the future!>
